title: Flu responsible for 22 more child deaths
text:
Flu responsible for 22 more child deaths 12:44pm EST - 01:02 
The flu claimed 22 children's lives this week, according to the latest report from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, bringing the total number of child deaths to 84 this season. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The flu claimed 22 children's lives this week, according to the latest report from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, bringing the total number of child deaths to 84 this season.
